refsection.title: DESCRIPTION

listitem.para: Display the list of command line options.
Specify the name of the project to load.
Specify the database type of the project, either "xml" or "db4ocs". This can usually be inferred.
Specify the name of the server providing the project. This is not needed if the project files are located on the local machine.
Specify the FieldWorks backup file to be restored and then loaded.

Paired with the -restore option, the flags parameter indicates which optional files to restore. The flags parameter has the form "clsf", where:
c - configuration files l - linked files (audio-visual media, pictures, etc.) s - spelling dictionary files f - supporting files (fonts, keyboards, converters)
Specify the language identifier for the desired user interface localization.

refsection.para: fieldworks-te provides tools for translating the Bible. These include a sophisticated editor that is knowledgeable about the structure of the Scriptures and various tools for checking the translation.

A FieldWorks project consists of data related to a particular language and the people who speak it. This includes both the translated Scriptures edited with fieldworks-te and the linguistic and anthropological information edited with fieldworks-flex. The last project with edited data when you exit fieldworks-te is the project that opens the next time you start it.

refsection.title: NOTES
refsection.para: /usr/bin/fieldworks-te is a wrapper around the C# program /usr/lib/fieldworks/FieldWorks.exe with the command line argument "-app TE".
